Job Title: Tech Mahindra hiring For AWS & SQL Coding-Pune  (Immediate Joiners)
Job Description: Tech Mahindra hiring Sr. Data Analyst(AWS & SQL Coding)-Pune   (Immediate Joiners Only) Role is to maintain and support technology solution using well-defined sets of processes, policies, procedures, standards and templates - customized for every implementation. - Manage a day-to-day tasks and deliverables to meet deadlines with reliability/dependability;- Run and monitor SOP based batch jobs the client projects;- Capture and log issues that happen during regular operations run;- Respond to end-user queries/clarifications and provide fixes as defined;- Escalate issues whenever required;- Document work, participate in meetings and assist in presenting issues and solutions both orally and in writing;- Update the operational tracker;- Understand issues, operating business rules, data, and processes;- Develop deep expertise in ETL process automation; - Adapt/enhance solutions to changing the needs;- Enable the operations of expertise in (a) data warehousing including ETL using technology stack of AWS Redshift, RDS, EC2, SQL, UNIX, Python along with basics of MSTR Perks and Benefits
